content: border = 30 in 75 cm square before blocking you can use any yarn & hook you like that suits your project color change the pattern is written as per one color the sample was created changing colors on each round if you change the colors cut the previous color yarn fasten_off and attach new yarn color at any same st where you finished the previous round e g if you slip_stitch to close the round into starting pop st attach new color yarn at any starting pop st you can use as many colors as you like let s start round 1 magic_ring ch3 19 double_crochet into magic_ring tighten magic_ring slip_stitch into the top chain of ch3 total 20 st round 2 ch3 1 double_crochet into the same st 2dc into previous st skip 1 st 2dc into the next st 2dc into the previous st the one we skipped x 9 slip_stitch into to the top chain of ch3 total 40 st round 3 turn your creation this is the only round that we turn our work from now on the back side will be the front one ch3 1dc x 2 2dc 1dc x 3 2dc x 3 1dc x 4 1dc x 3 2dc x 4 1dc x 4 slip_stitch into to the top chain of ch3 total 48 st add surface slip_stitch into the top of each st of round 2 ♡ https //linktr ee/bebablanket ♡ 2 round 4 starting pop 1dc x 5 pop 1dc x 5 x 7 slip_stitch into starting pop total 48 st 40 double_crochet 8 pop round 5 single_crochet into the first st ch1 skip 2 st 7dc into the next st skip 2 st ch1 single_crochet ch1 skip 2 st 7dc into the next st skip 2 st ch1 x 7 slip_stitch into to the top of single_crochet total 64 st 56 double_crochet 8 single_crochet 16 ch1 space round 6 fpsc into the first st single_crochet into ch1 space 1 bpdc x 7 single_crochet into ch1 space fpsc single_crochet into ch1 space 1 bpdc x 7 single_crochet into ch1 space x 7 slip_stitch into the top of fpsc total 80 st 56 bpdc 16 single_crochet 8 fpsc round 7 ch3 1 double_crochet into the same st 1 bpdc x 9 3dc 1 bpdc x 9 x 7 1 double_crochet into the slip_stitch that closed round 5 slip_stitch into the top chain of ch3 total 96 st 72 bpdc 24 double_crochet round 8 ch3 1 double_crochet x 95 1 double_crochet into each st slip_stitch into the top chain of ch3 total 96 st add surface slip_stitch into the top of each st of round 7 round 9 starting pop 1dc x 5 pop 1dc x 5 x 15 slip_stitch into starting pop total 96 st 80 double_crochet 16 pop round 10 single_crochet into the first st ch1 skip 2 st 7dc into the next st skip 2 st ch1 single_crochet ch1 skip 2 st 7dc into the next st skip
